title: February Metal Type News
content:
The February edition of the Metal Type newsletter is now out. Click this link to take a look at the video: [http://j.mp/k5KA95](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018211123/http:/j.mp/k5KA95 "http://j.mp/k5KA95")

As well as me telling you what's new on the site the video also shows an Adana 8X5 table-top platen that has been converted to hot foil printing. I recently bought the machine on Ebay in a non-working state, and I am in the process of getting it up and running.

If you don't already get newsletters from Metal Type, you can subscribe here: [http://bit.ly/n3wkjc](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018211123/http:/bit.ly/n3wkjc "http://bit.ly/n3wkjc")

Want to start printing letterpress at home? Get First Steps in Letterpress: [http://j.mp/W5M8F3](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018211123/http:/j.mp/W5M8F3 "http://j.mp/W5M8F3")

All the Best  
Dave Hughes  
York, UK
author: MetalType
